Text:
I made it work. This is what i did.

I have Steam installed an my PC, so there i found demo of the game and installed it. During isntalation it instaled the newest Directx, Microsoft .NET Framework and another Miscrosoft XNS Framework (dunno if its XNS - something like that).
After that the Steam Demo didn't work, but the full torrent version did :). So the game probably needs this Frameworks to run or something like that. :)

Love the game!!!
Seed people! Crap, it's only a 38.45 MEG game. You can seed that around 5 times over in about 4 hours........Don't be a weed and seed. Can't even d/l it due to unseeders.
